dmca.title: Letter of Claim - www.strix.org.uk
dmca.body:
The C&D letter was sent as a 15 page PDF document from which I was unable to extract the text.  The text on each page seems to have been made into an image.  I may be able to type it out/OCR the thing at a later date, right now I'm attending to taking my pages offline.

The document is available on my website at:

http://strix.org.uk/misc/launch.yahoo/strix.or.pdf

Although this is in the Anticircumvention section, the DMCA does not apply to it as I live in Alderney (an island off Europe) and the document was sent from England.
